name: The Dead Sea Scrolls Adventure (itch)
description:
IMPORTANT:

  • Please play the experience in Fullscreen by opening it in the bottom right of the embed once you press "Run Game"
  • Press "SPACE" to continue dialogue and to start speaking to characters in-game

________________________

Welcome to The Dead Sea Scrolls Adventure!

The purpose of the experience on Itch is to allow others to playtest what is created. The experience itself is to teach others about the discovery and contents of the 7 Dead Sea Scrolls found in caves near Jerusalem. This experience is not yet finished.

Thank you for playing!

Created by Cave3 Studios
